column4: I had question about canonical how does it provide funds? leach off of shuttleworth? or Support for Ubuntu?
err generate funds would be better word
any client using H.323 is fine
so anyone had an answer to my question
I read once that canonical intends to make money teaching people to provide support for ubuntu installations, small and large.
are they not doing support themselves?
well, I get plenty of support myself, already. Just how they get my money, well, I guess I'll have to donate
really? I find that rather pleasing
no he has to put in password inorder to access the interweb
how else do you play realplayer in mplayer?
I just never thought of it as the 'crazy' plugin
now, you make me go try realplayer streams with mozilla-mplayer, so I can refresh my memory :)
let me know how it works out
do you have official realplayer installed?
no, I was talking with Zoe_ earlier & couldn't help, don't know nvidia
